summary: This is an internal email from Jennifer Brown at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York, discussing a significant delay (2.5 hours) that prevented a lawyer from seeing a client housed in the SHU (Special Housing Unit). The email requests an update on the issue and asks about hardening attorney conference room #4 to alleviate delays.

persons.name: Jennifer Brown
persons.context: Appears to be a staff member at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York, communicating about operational issues regarding attorney-client meetings.

events.title: Attorney denied access to SHU client
events.description: A lawyer waited 2.5 hours and was ultimately unable to see a client housed in the Special Housing Unit (SHU) at the Metropolitan Correctional Center.

locations: CLC New York Metropolitan Correctional Center, 150 Park Row, New York, New York 10007
keyFacts: On July 30, 2019, a lawyer experienced a 2.5-hour delay and was ultimately denied access to a client in the SHU at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York.
Jennifer Brown, a staff member, sent an email seeking an update on the issue and inquiring about hardening attorney conference room #4 to prevent such delays.
The document is marked as 'CONFIDENTIAL' and is part of the SDNY (Southern District of New York) case files related to Epstein.
